thread.title: Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder
thread.title_full: Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder

title: Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder
text:
> Florida Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck is hit by Tennessee Titans defensive end Karl Klug (97) in the first half of an NFL football game Sunday, Sept. 27, 2015, in Nashville, Tenn.
